pr_title: scale-color $lightness must use $secondary for dark themes

droid_missed: .name selector lightness changed from 30% to 50% in desktop/user.scss (inconsistent with PR pattern)
.name selector lightness changed from 30% to 50% in mobile/user.scss (mobile variant)
golden_missed: mobile modal .custom-message-length lightness changed from 70% to 30% (inconsistent with desktop)

notes: The PR modifies many SCSS files to add dark-light-choose() wrappers for dark theme support. Both droid and golden correctly identified that some changes inadvertently altered light theme values. Golden had one false positive where it claimed a 70%->30% change that actually went the opposite direction. Droid was precise but missed the user.scss .name changes. Golden caught the user.scss issue but missed the mobile modal inconsistency.
